[Special Events](https://www.corinthtx.gov/special-events)

* My
  Community

  + **[City Hall On-Demand](https://www.cityofcorinth.com/communications/page/city-hall-demand)**
  + [Upcoming City Events](https://www.cityofcorinth.com/special-events)



The City of Corinth is grateful for your interest in becoming a 2026 Event Sponsor. With more than 19 community events, unique sponsorship levels, and a variety of tailored benefits, there's a place for your business at the Commons at Agora.

As our city continues to grow and residents seek more opportunities to connect and celebrate, your support helps bring these events to life. We truly couldn't do it without our sponsors—so thank you for being part of it!

If you have any questions, contact us at
[SpecialEvents@corinthtx.gov](mailto:SpecialEvents@corinthtx.gov)
